Trade/Device Name(s): Contour® Next EZ Blood Glucose Meter
Contour® Next EZ Blood Glucose Monitoring System
Document Summary: FDA 510(k) summary for Contour® Next EZ Blood Glucose Meter for self-testing glucose in capillary whole blood using amperometric electrochemical detection.
Indications for Use Summary: Over-the-counter device for self-testing by persons with diabetes to quantitatively measure glucose in whole blood from fresh fingertip capillary samples, aiding in monitoring diabetes control; not intended for diagnosis or screening or for use on neonates.
